title: Secluded Beachfront Villa Luxury in Vanuatu
description: Indulge in the ultimate island escape to the Tamanu on the Beach resort, nestled on the southern coast of Vanuatu. Located right on the beachfront, enjoy five nights at this secluded boutique resort, staying in a Beachview Villa with daily breakfasts - including a champagne breakfast, a signature lunch, two-course dinner, return airport transfers, romantic private bonfire experience on the beach, nightly cocktails, couples’ massage and AU$100 spa credit and more for two.

title: Tropical Lagoon Luxury with Gourmet Dining
description: Experience ultimate romance in a waterfront studio at Sunset Bungalows, Vanuatu. Located on the tranquil, unspoiled island of Efate, this unique property offers stunning lagoon views from every room and gourmet dining. Unwind with daily à la carte breakfast, one two-course dinner, one nightly drink each, return airport transfers and more included.
offer_address: Teouma Rd,, Emten Lagoon, Port Vila, Vanuatu

title: Award-Winning Vanuatu Villa Luxury with All-Inclusive Dining & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Escape to a South Pacific island paradise, staying in boutique luxury at The Havannah Vanuatu. Surrounded by azure waters, colourful coral and palm-fringed sands, this five-star, absolute beachfront resort offers all the charm of a family-owned property alongside world-class luxuries. Located on Efate, the largest island in Vanuatu, this adults-only retreat sits opposite the breathtaking Port Havannah harbour, your launchpad for snorkelling, watersports and sailing adventures. Take the complimentary resort shuttle to Vanuatu's capital, Port Vila, and discover the national museum, Mele Cascades waterfall, Ekasup Cultural Village and more.

It’s not hard to see why this resort has won so many awards - including Tripadvisor's prestigious Travellers' Choice 2020 Best of the Best honour, placing it among the top 1% of hotels worldwide and the top five in the South Pacific. With a collection of traditional thatched villas tucked away in tropical gardens or on the beachfront, gourmet all-inclusive à la carte dining showcasing fresh local produce and seafood, a blissful spa and a host of activities, from sunset cruising to PADI diving, this island oasis leaves you wanting for nothing.
